entity.name: Stacey Abrams
entity.description: Candidate for Governor of Georgia, Stacey Abrams

text:
@GovKemp @remindmetweets in one month - to see how many people in Georgia get #Coronavirus as a direct result of this stupid decision.

If ~55,000 more voters (out of ~4 million) had voted for @staceyabrams in 2018, this nightmare wouldn't be happening to the people of Georgia.
